dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Trespasser in the Whispering Woods, what brings you here? Speak quickly or face my wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. I seek to restore the balance of nature.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Balance? Actions speak louder than words, sorcerer. What proof do you offer?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I possess the ancient scrolls of the Air Isles. They hold the secrets to restoring harmony.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ancient scrolls, you say? The air whispers of your sincerity.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Allow me to show you their power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well, sorcerer, show me. But know this, deceit will be met with fury.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I need your guidance to unlock their potential.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You dare ask for guidance without proving yourself first? Begone!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have defeated the Whispering Serpent! Isn't that proof enough?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Defeating a beast proves your strength, not your intentions. Why should I trust you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Because I fight not for power, but for the balance of our realms.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Words are wind. Prove this balance by actions, not boasts.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Distrust blinds us to potential allies. See reason.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You speak of reason, yet your actions are unknown. Leave or face consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I bring warning of a greater threat. An unknown darkness approaches.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A greater threat, you say? Speak more of this darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: A force that disrupts the elemental harmony. We must unite.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unity in the face of darkness? Perhaps there is wisdom in your words. Show me your resolve.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Darkness that even you, mighty guardian, cannot stand alone against.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Flattery will get you nowhere. Face my wrath for your insolence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I mean no harm. I'm just passing through.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Passing through sacred grounds? Your presence is an offense!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My journey is essential. I must traverse these woods.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Essential to you, perhaps. Prove it or leave.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to protect the realms from a great disruption.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Big words for a trespasser. Show your worth or begone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I respect your domain, but my mission cannot wait.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? You disrespect by intrusion. Face your fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: There is no need for hostility. We can coexist.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexistence requires trust. Trust you have yet to earn.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then help me earn it. Guide me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Why should I guide an intruder? Your intentions are unclear.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you don't trust me, then let me prove myself.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Prove yourself how? By disrupting my domain further?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave if you insist, but I seek a path to Frostbite Peaks.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Frostbite Peaks is no place for the unworthy. Leave now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I need its secrets to restore balance to the realms.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Only the worthy may seek such secrets. You have not proven worthy.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you will not guide me, others will. You can't stop me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Others? Arrogance will be your downfall. Prepare to be vanquished.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Stand aside, guardian. I have no time for interference.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Interference? You dare command me in my own woods?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have the power to back my words. Do not test me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words for a lone sorcerer. Show me this power!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well. Prepare yourself.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You think you can best the Ancient Oak Warden? Fool!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You may have strength, but I have greater cunning.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Cunning alone will not save you. Face my wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no quarrel with you, but I need to pass.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: No quarrel? Your presence is quarrel enough. Leave or face consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If I must fight to prove my resolve, so be it.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Weak threats from a weak sorcerer. Prepare to be crushed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well. I will find another path.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise choice. Begone and do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You cannot stop me. I will pass through these woods.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Such arrogance. Try if you dare, and meet your end!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then we shall see who prevails.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your fate is sealed, intruder. Prepare for battle!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no time for this. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Run while you can, coward.
